data.text:
@kevinreutens And this podcast talks to folks who participated in the Moderna vaccine trials. It's a start. Thankfully, peer-reviewed articles about the vaccines are now coming out because I'm not going to trust what a pharmaceutical company says about its product.

https://t.co/fJaPscMwAp

@kevinreutens I don't know how things are in Australia, but I know good information about the vaccines hasn't been widely disseminated here. But this is a good podcast that discusses these mRNA vaccines: https://t.co/sbfNLXaPQw

@kevinreutens Mate, the problem with this is that humans have never achieved natural herd immunity against a pandemic. We've only reached it through vaccination, so we're basically screwed without them.
